name: My Cherry Tree
description:
TO GET THE CONTROLS RUNNING : Click the fullscreen icon and click OUTSIDE the game. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Initially made in 4 days with PICO-8 for Mini Ludum Dare 68 (theme : Childhood Memories). Weather added and bird behaviour improved afterwards.

http://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php
Controls :
LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN : Move
C : Action
X + UP/DOWN : Change speed

For the theme of childhood memories, I chose the cherry tree in my former garden. It produces actually cherries, not cherry blossoms, but I put some because who doesn't love cherry blossoms ?
It's an open-ended game. Shape your tree as you feel like. If you have birds perched in your tree, you have pretty much seen all the content.
Let me know how you did and what you would like to see improved in a future version :)
